Package it.unicam.cs.pa.robot

Interface Robot

All Superinterfaces:
RobotLoopManagement, RobotMovementManagement
All Known Implementing Classes:
BasicRobot
public interface Robot extends RobotMovementManagement, RobotLoopManagement
The Robot interface represents a robot, capable of moving, signaling or stopping signaling conditions and stopping its movement.
